CatDescriptText: Delores Thomas, 2127 Hermans Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1958, pg. 6 with question: "Do you believe the trouble in Middle East will start an atomic world war?" answer reads: "No, I don't think so, because atomic warfare would bring about more destruction than either country is bargaining for."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Deloros Thomas wearing light colored long sleeved shirt and light colored apron, standing with right hand resting on basket in interior with two toned walls, clock that reads 1:35, and several labeled items, including "Toledo" and "Phill..."
